DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$query1");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'Ã¤','ae'),'Ã„','Ae'),'Ã¶','oe'),'Ã–','Oe'),'Ã¼','ue'),'Ãœ','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'ðŸ€',''),'ÃŸ','ss') as profile,
   SUM(page_impressions_unique)/COUNT(distinct time) AS impressionsUnique,
   CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) as month_year
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` AS facebook
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
  AND $Zeitraum
  AND page_follows IS NOT NULL
 GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique,
   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY impressionsUnique DESC) AS profile_rank
 FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile IN ($query1)
 ), filter_month_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(impressionsUnique) AS impressionsUnique
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile NOT IN ($query1)
 GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique
 FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique
 FROM filter_month_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
),privous_months_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) as month_year,
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'Ã¤','ae'),'Ã„','Ae'),'Ã¶','oe'),'Ã–','Oe'),'Ã¼','ue'),'Ãœ','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'ðŸ€',''),'ÃŸ','ss') as profile,
   CASE "${Monat:text}"
   WHEN "Jahr" THEN 0
   ELSE SUM(page_impressions_unique)/COUNT(distinct time) END AS impressionsUnique
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` AS facebook
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
   AND True
   AND CASE "${Monat:text}"
      WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr  
      ELSE EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) <= LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), MONTH)
      END
 GROUP BY profile, month_year
), privous_months_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique
 FROM privous_months_profiles
 WHERE profile IN ($query1)
 ), privous_months_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(impressionsUnique) AS impressionsUnique
 FROM privous_months_profiles
 WHERE profile NOT IN ($query1)
 GROUP BY month_year), privous_months_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique
 FROM privous_months_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique
 FROM privous_months_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile)
--SELECT * FROM privous_months_top_8_rest_profiles
SELECT
*
FROM (
 SELECT
   DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1) as month_year,
   FORMAT_DATE('%%B %%Y', DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1)) AS formatted_date,
   profile,
   ROUND(impressionsUnique) as impressionsUnique
 FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1) as month_year,
   FORMAT_DATE('%%B %%Y', DATE(CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(1)] AS INT64), CAST(SPLIT(month_year, '-')[OFFSET(0)] AS INT64), 1)) AS formatted_date,
   profile,
   ROUND(impressionsUnique) as impressionsUnique
 FROM privous_months_top_8_rest_profiles
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
)
PIVOT (
  SUM(impressionsUnique) FOR profile IN (%s)
)
ORDER BY DATE(month_year) ASC
""", profiles);

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'Ã¤','ae'),'Ã„','Ae'),'Ã¶','oe'),'Ã–','Oe'),'Ã¼','ue'),'Ãœ','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'ðŸ€',''),'ÃŸ','ss') as profile,
   SUM(page_impressions_unique) AS impressionsUnique,
      CASE "${Monat:text}"
      WHEN "Jahr" THEN "year"
      ELSE CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) 
      END
    as month_year,
    count(DISTINCT time) as days,
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` AS facebook
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
      AND $Zeitraum 
       AND page_follows IS NOT NULL
 GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique,
   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY impressionsUnique DESC) AS profile_rank,
   days
 FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique,
  days 
  FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank <= 8
 ), filter_month_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(impressionsUnique) AS impressionsUnique, 
   MAX(days) as days,
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank > 8
 GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique,
   days
 FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   impressionsUnique, 
   days
 FROM filter_month_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
)
SELECT profile, ROUND(impressionsUnique/(days)) as impressionsUnique FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles

WITH insights_values AS(SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))/1000000 as interactionsMill,

  DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) as month
  
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
-- Daten des ausgewÃ¤hlten Zeitraums minus 1 Jahr
WHERE CASE $Monat WHEN 13 THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr ELSE (DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)) END
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC),
ownposts_values AS(
  SELECT
  sum(IFNULL(post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + post_activity_by_action_type_share + post_activity_by_action_type_comment,0))/1000000 as interactionsMill,

  DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) as month
  
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
-- Daten des ausgewÃ¤hlten Zeitraums minus 1 Jahr
WHERE CASE $Monat WHEN 13 THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr ELSE (DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)) END
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC
),
joined_values AS(
  SELECT insights_values.month as month, insights_values.interactionsMill as interactionsMillInsights, ownposts_values.interactionsMill as interactionsMillOwnPosts  FROM insights_values
  JOIN ownposts_values
  ON insights_values.month = ownposts_values.month
)
SELECT CASE
WHEN month < DATE(2024,4,1) THEN interactionsMillInsights
ELSE interactionsMillOwnPosts END AS interactionsMill,
month
FROM joined_values
ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT
SUM(Reaktionen) as Reaktionen,
SUM(Kommentare) as Kommentare,
SUM(Shares) as Shares
FROM(
SELECT
  $reactions as Reaktionen,

  $comments as Kommentare,

  $shares as Shares, --ZÃ¤hlen diese als shares?,
  
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
AND $interaction_Zeitraum
UNION ALL
SELECT 
$reactions_year_2024 as Reaktionen,

$comments_year_2024 as Kommentare,

$shares_year_2024 as Shares

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

SELECT SUM(lm_interactions)/1000000 as lm_interactions,
  FROM(
  SELECT
  ($reactions + $comments + $shares) as lm_interactions,
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_Zeitraum
  -- should this stay for facebookInsights????
  --AND page_follows is not null
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
  $reactions_year_2024 + $comments_year_2024 + $shares_year_2024 as lm_interactions,

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

DECLARE Monat INT64;
SET Monat = $Monat;

IF Monat = 13 THEN 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE "SELECT '' ";
ELSE 
  EXECUTE IMMEDIATE """
    WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
      SELECT
        ($reactions_last_month + $comments_last_month + $shares_last_month) / 1000000 AS past_sum_in_mil
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset_last_month}${table_suffix}` AS facebook
      JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = '$LRA')
      WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) 
        AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
    ),
    current_value_in_mil AS (
      SELECT
        ($reactions + $comments + $shares) / 1000000 AS current_sum_in_mil
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` AS facebook
      JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = '$LRA')
      WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr
    )

    SELECT (current_sum_in_mil / past_sum_in_mil - 1) * 100 AS diff_mil, 
    FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil
  """;
END IF;

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT SUM(lm_interactions)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  FROM(
  SELECT
  ($reactions_last_year + $comments_last_year + $shares_last_year) as lm_interactions,
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset_last_year}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_last_year_Zeitraum
  -- should this stay for facebookInsights????
  --AND page_follows is not null
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
  $reactions_year_2024 + $comments_year_2024 + $shares_year_2024 as lm_interactions,

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024)
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT SUM(lm_interactions)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  FROM(
  SELECT
  ($reactions + $comments + $shares) as lm_interactions,
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_Zeitraum
  -- should this stay for facebookInsights????
  --AND page_follows is not null
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
  $reactions_year_2024 + $comments_year_2024 + $shares_year_2024 as lm_interactions,

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024)
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as videoViews10sMill,
  DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) as month,
 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE CASE $Monat WHEN 13 THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr ELSE (DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)) END
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'Ã¤','ae'),'Ã„','Ae'),'Ã¶','oe'),'Ã–','Oe'),'Ã¼','ue'),'Ãœ','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'ðŸ€',''),'ÃŸ','ss') as profile,
   SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0)) as videoViews10s,
   SUM(page_impressions_unique) AS impressionsUnique,
      CASE "${Monat:text}"
      WHEN "Jahr" THEN "year"
      ELSE CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) 
      END
    as month_year,
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` AS facebook
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
  AND  $Zeitraum
 GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s,
   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY videoViews10s DESC) AS profile_rank
 FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank <= 8
 ), filter_month_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(videoViews10s) AS videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank > 8
 GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   videoViews10s
 FROM filter_month_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
)
SELECT profile, videoViews10s FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Ã˜ Pro Tag')), 'Ã˜ Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT 'Ã˜ Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

SELECT
videoViews10sMill,
videoViews10sMill/(days) as videoViews10sMillPerDay
FROM
(SELECT
SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as videoViews10sMill,
COUNT(distinct time) as days,

 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND CASE $Monat
  WHEN 13 THEN True
  ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) END
), past_value_per_day AS (
  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/$number_of_days_last_month as past_sum_per_day
  FROM past_value_in_mil
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/$number_of_days as current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  COUNT(DISTINCT time) as time,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND  CASE "${Monat:text}" WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr -1 ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr-1 END
), past_value_per_day AS (
  --SELECT past_sum_in_mil/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 YEAR),MONTH),DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),INTERVAL 1 YEAR),DAY) + 1) as past_sum_per_day
  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/time as past_sum_per_day
  FROM past_value_in_mil
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_video_views_10s,0))/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  COUNT(DISTINCT time) as time,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND $Zeitraum
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/(time) as current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

SELECT COALESCE(CAST(ROUND(SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(engaged_users),SUM(num_day_or_post))) as INT64),0) as engaged_users_PerDay,
  profile as Profil
  FROM(

  SELECT
  $aktive_nutzer_record as engaged_users,
  $aktive_nutzer_post_or_day as num_day_or_post,
  profile
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_Zeitraum
  AND $aktive_nutzer_condition
  GROUP BY profile

  UNION ALL
  SELECT
  $aktive_nutzer_record_year_2024 as engaged_users,
  $aktive_nutzer_year_2024 as num_day_or_post,
  profile

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024
  AND post_impressions_unique IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY profile)
  GROUP BY profile
  ORDER BY engaged_users_PerDay desc

SELECT
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_impressions_unique)/(COUNT(facebook.time))) as INT64) as impressions_unique_PerDay ,
profile as Profil

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
AND page_follows is not null
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY impressions_unique_PerDay desc

SELECT
profile as Profil,
page_follows as followers,
time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum AND page_follows IS not null AND page_follows > 1000)


ORDER BY followers desc

SELECT 
lm.Profil,
(lm_follower/llm_follower - 1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
page_follows lm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum and page_follows is not null AND page_follows >1000)

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
page_follows as llm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE CASE "${Monat:text}" WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr -1 ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) END)

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC

SELECT
profile as Profil,
SUM(page_video_views_10s) as videoViews10s

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True

AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY videoViews10s desc

SELECT
SUM(page_video_views) as videoViews3s,
profile
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True

AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY videoViews3s desc

(SELECT 
a.profile,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")  
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC)

SELECT
  lm.Profil as Profil,
  (lm.ARD_Facebook_Score / llm.ARD_Facebook_Score - 1) * 100 as ARDScore_Veraenderung
FROM
(
    SELECT
      a.profile as Profil,
      ROUND(a.followers / 1000 + b.interactions / 10) as ARD_Facebook_Score
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          profile,
          followers
        FROM
          `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
          JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
            facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
            AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
          )
        WHERE
          True
          AND time = (
            SELECT
              MAX(time)
            FROM
              `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE
              $Zeitraum
          )
        GROUP BY
          profile,
          followers
      ) as a,
      (
        SELECT
          (
            ROUND (
              AVG(
                ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments
              )
            )
          ) AS interactions,
          profile
        FROM
          `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
          JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
            facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
            AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
          )
        WHERE
          True
          AND $Zeitraum
        GROUP BY
          profile
      ) as b
    WHERE
      a.profile = b.profile
    ORDER BY
      ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
  ) as lm
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      a.profile as Profil,
      ROUND(a.followers / 1000 + b.interactions / 10) as ARD_Facebook_Score
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          profile,
          followers
        FROM
          `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
          JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
            facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
            AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
          )
        WHERE
          True
          AND time = (
            SELECT
              MAX(time)
            FROM
              `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE
              CASE
                "${Monat:text}"
                WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(
                  YEAR
                  from
                    time
                ) = $Jahr -1
                ELSE (EXTRACT(
                  MONTH
                  from
                    time
                ) = EXTRACT(
                  MONTH
                  from
                    DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                )
                AND EXTRACT(
                  YEAR
                  from
                    time
                ) = EXTRACT(
                  YEAR
                  from
                    DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                )
              )END ) 
            GROUP BY
              profile,
              followers
          ) as a,
          (
            SELECT
              (
                ROUND (
                  AVG(
                    ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments
                  )
                )
              ) AS interactions,
              profile
            FROM
              `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
              JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
                facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
                AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
              )
            WHERE
              True
              AND CASE "${Monat:text}" WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(year from time) = $Jahr -1 ELSE (EXTRACT(
                MONTH
                from
                  time
              ) = EXTRACT(
                MONTH
                from
                  DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
              )
              AND EXTRACT(
                YEAR
                from
                  time
              ) = EXTRACT(
                YEAR
                from
                  DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
              ))END
            GROUP BY
              profile
          ) as b
        WHERE
          a.profile = b.profile
        ORDER BY
          ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
      ) as llm ON lm.Profil = llm.Profil
    ORDER BY
      lm.ARD_Facebook_Score DESC

(SELECT 
a.profile,
CASE
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Hamburg" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.64516129)
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Niedersachsen" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.14714538)
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Schleswig-Holstein" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.40420372)
WHEN a.profile = "NDR Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN ROUND((a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10)*0.71942446) END as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")  
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile AND a.profile IN UNNEST(["NDR Hamburg", "NDR Niedersachsen", "NDR Schleswig-Holstein", "NDR Mecklenburg-Vorpommern"])
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC)

SELECT profile as Profil, SUM(Interaktionen) as InteraktionenProPost,
  FROM(
  SELECT
  ($reactions + $comments + $shares) as Interaktionen,
  profile
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_Zeitraum
  GROUP BY profile


  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
  $reactions_year_2024 + $comments_year_2024 + $shares_year_2024 as Interaktionen,
  profile

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024
  GROUP BY profile)
  GROUP By profile
  ORDER BY InteraktionenProPost DESC

WITH interaktionenProPost AS (SELECT 
profile as Profil,
sum(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link) as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
GROUP by profile)
-- Interaktionen pro Post und Anzahl Posts
SELECT Profil, anzahlPosts FROM(
SELECT
t2.Profil,
SUM(anzahlPosts) as anzahlPosts,
MAX(t2.Interaktionen) as Interaktionen

FROM
(SELECT 
profile as Profil,
COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts,
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile
UNION ALL
SELECT
profile as Profil,
COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsExpiredPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile) as t1
JOIN (SELECT 
Profil,
Interaktionen from interaktionenProPost) as t2 ON t1.Profil = t2.Profil
GROUP BY t2.Profil
--ORDER BY CAST(ROUND(Interaktionen/(DATE_DIFF(LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),MONTH),DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1),DAY) + 1)) AS INT64)  DESC
)
ORDER by Interaktionen desc

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT DISTINCT
  profile,
  PostDatum,
  Post,
  link,
  Typ,
  Interaktionen,
  Reaktionen,
  Kommentare,
  Shares,
  total_video_10s_views 
FROM (
  SELECT 
    profiles.profile,
    facebook.time as PostDatum,
    message as Post,
    facebook.link,
    type as Typ,
    post_reactions_by_type_total_like + post_reactions_by_type_total_love + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry  + post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
      post_activity_by_action_type_share + post_activity_by_action_type_comment as Interaktionen,
    post_reactions_by_type_total_like + post_reactions_by_type_total_love + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry  + post_reactions_by_type_total_anger as Reaktionen,
    post_activity_by_action_type_comment as Kommentare,
    post_activity_by_action_type_share as Shares,
    total_video_10s_views,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY profiles.facebookID ORDER BY 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_like + post_reactions_by_type_total_love + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
      post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry  + post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
      post_activity_by_action_type_share + post_activity_by_action_type_comment DESC) as row_num
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  LEFT JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnVideos${table_suffix}` as videos ON facebook.objectId = videos.externalId
  WHERE True
 AND CASE WHEN facebook.objectId = videos.externalId THEN True
                     ELSE TRUE END

AND CASE "${Monat:text}"
    WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr
    ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from facebook.time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr
    END

  
) as subquery
WHERE row_num = 1
ORDER BY Interaktionen DESC

WITH followers as (
  SELECT 
lm.Profil,
lm_follower as followers,
lm_follower-llm_follower as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_follower,llm_follower)-1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
page_follows lm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum AND page_follows is not null AND page_follows > 1000)

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
page_follows as llm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE 
             CASE "${Monat:text}"
               WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr - 1
               ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
               END
               AND page_follows > 1000)

ORDER BY page_follows desc) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC
),anzahl_posts as (
  SELECT
Profil,
SUM(anzahlPosts) as anzahlPosts,
FROM
(SELECT 
profile as Profil,
COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile
UNION ALL
SELECT
profile as Profil,
COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts,
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsExpiredPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile)
GROUP BY Profil
), aktive_nutzer AS(
WITH aktive_nutzer_last_month AS(
SELECT
CAST(ROUND(SAFE_DIVIDE($aktive_nutzer_record_last_month,$aktive_nutzer_post_or_day_last_month)) as INT64) AS aktive_nutzer,
	profile
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset_last_month}${table_suffix}` AS facebook
      JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = '$LRA')
      WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, LEAST($Monat,12), 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) 
        AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, LEAST($Monat,12), 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
AND $aktive_nutzer_condition_last_month
GROUP BY profile
),
aktive_nutzer_current_month AS(
SELECT CAST(ROUND(SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(engaged_users),SUM(num_day_or_post))) as INT64) as aktive_nutzer,
  profile
  FROM(

  SELECT
  $aktive_nutzer_record as engaged_users,
  $aktive_nutzer_post_or_day as num_day_or_post,
  profile
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_Zeitraum
  AND $aktive_nutzer_condition
  GROUP BY profile

  UNION ALL
  SELECT
  $aktive_nutzer_record_year_2024 as engaged_users,
  $aktive_nutzer_year_2024 as num_day_or_post,
  profile

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024
  AND post_impressions_unique IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY profile)
  GROUP BY profile
),
aktive_nutzer_year AS(
SELECT CAST(ROUND(SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(engaged_users),SUM(num_day_or_post))) as INT64) as aktive_nutzer,
profile
  FROM(

  SELECT
  $aktive_nutzer_record_last_year as engaged_users,
  $aktive_nutzer_post_or_day_last_year as num_day_or_post,
profile
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset_last_year}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_last_year_Zeitraum
  AND $aktive_nutzer_condition_last_year
  group by profile


  UNION ALL
  SELECT
  $aktive_nutzer_record_year_2024 as engaged_users,
  $aktive_nutzer_year_2024 as num_day_or_post,
  profile

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024
  AND post_impressions_unique IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY profile)
  GROUP BY profile
), joined_aktive_nutzer AS (
SELECT aktive_nutzer_current_month.profile AS Profil,
   aktive_nutzer_current_month.aktive_nutzer AS lm_aktive_nutzer,
   $zusammenfassung_dataset_aktive_nutzer.aktive_nutzer AS llm_aktive_nutzer
   FROM aktive_nutzer_current_month
   LEFT JOIN $zusammenfassung_dataset_aktive_nutzer
   ON aktive_nutzer_current_month.profile = $zusammenfassung_dataset_aktive_nutzer.profile
)
SELECT
Profil,
lm_aktive_nutzer as AktiveNutzer,
lm_aktive_nutzer-llm_aktive_nutzer as AktiveNutzerVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_aktive_nutzer,llm_aktive_nutzer)-1) * 100 as AktiveNutzerVeraenderung,
FROM joined_aktive_nutzer), interaktionen as (
WITH interactions_last_month AS(
SELECT 
$reactions_last_month + $comments_last_month + $shares_last_month AS interactions,
profile
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset_last_month}${table_suffix}` AS facebook
      JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = '$LRA')
      WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, LEAST($Monat,12), 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) 
        AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, LEAST($Monat,12), 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
GROUP BY profile
),
interactions_current_month AS(
SELECT SUM(lm_interactions) as interactions,
profile
  FROM(
  SELECT
  ($reactions + $comments + $shares) as lm_interactions,
profile
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_Zeitraum
group by profile
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
  $reactions_year_2024 + $comments_year_2024 + $shares_year_2024 as lm_interactions,
profile

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024
group by profile)
group by profile
),
interactions_year AS(
SELECT SUM(lm_interactions) as interactions,
profile
  FROM(
  SELECT
  ($reactions_last_year + $comments_last_year + $shares_last_year) as lm_interactions,
profile
  
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.${interaction_dataset_last_year}${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  AND $interaction_last_year_Zeitraum
  group by profile
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
  $reactions_year_2024 + $comments_year_2024 + $shares_year_2024 as lm_interactions,
profile

  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) >= 4 AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) <= 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024
group by profile)
group by profile
),
interactions_joined AS(
   SELECT interactions_current_month.profile AS Profil,
   interactions_current_month.interactions AS lm_interactions,
   $zusammenfassung_dataset.interactions AS llm_interactions
   FROM interactions_current_month 
   LEFT JOIN $zusammenfassung_dataset
   ON interactions_current_month.profile = $zusammenfassung_dataset.profile
)
SELECT 
Profil,
lm_interactions as Interaktionen,
lm_interactions - llm_interactions as InteraktionenVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_interactions,llm_interactions)-1)*100 as InteraktionenVeraenderung,
FROM
interactions_joined), potenzielle_reichweite as (
SELECT
lm.Profil,
lm_potenzielle_reichweite as PotenzielleReichweite,
lm_potenzielle_reichweite - llm_potenzielle_reichweite as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_potenzielle_reichweite,llm_potenzielle_reichweite)-1)*100 as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
profile as Profil,
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_impressions_unique)/(COUNT(time))) as INT64) as lm_potenzielle_reichweite

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND page_follows is not null
AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY lm_potenzielle_reichweite desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
profile as Profil,
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_impressions_unique)/COUNT(time)) as INT64) as llm_potenzielle_reichweite

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND page_follows is not null

AND 
             CASE "${Monat:text}"
               WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr - 1
               ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
               END 
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY llm_potenzielle_reichweite desc
) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm_potenzielle_reichweite DESC
), video_start as (
SELECT
lm.Profil,
lm_videoViews10s as videoViews10s,
lm_videoViews10s - llm_videoViews10s as videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_videoViews10s,llm_videoViews10s)-1)*100 as videoViews10sVeraenderung,
lm_videoViews3s as videoViews3s,
lm_videoViews3s - llm_videoViews3s as videoViews3sVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_videoViews3s,llm_videoViews3s)-1)*100 as videoViews3sVeraenderung,
FROM
(SELECT
SUM(page_video_views_10s) as lm_videoViews10s,
SUM(page_video_views) as lm_videoViews3s,
profile as Profil

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND page_follows is not null

AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY lm_videoViews10s, lm_videoViews3s DESC
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
profile as Profil,
SUM(page_video_views_10s) as llm_videoViews10s,
SUM(page_video_views) as llm_videoViews3s

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND page_follows is not null
AND   
             CASE "${Monat:text}"
               WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr - 1
               ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
               END
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY llm_videoViews10s, llm_videoViews3s DESC
) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_videoViews10s, lm.lm_videoViews3s DESC
), ard_facebook_score as (
SELECT
lm.Profil as Profil,
lm.ARD_Facebook_Score as ARD_facebook_score,
lm.ARD_Facebook_Score-llm.ARD_Facebook_Score as ARDScore_VeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm.ARD_Facebook_Score,llm.ARD_Facebook_Score)-1)*100 as ARDScore_Veraenderung

FROM(SELECT 
a.profile as Profil,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")  
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum and followers is not null)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC) as lm
  LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT 
a.profile as Profil,
ROUND(a.followers/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score

FROM
(SELECT 
profile,
followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA") 
  WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
             WHERE 
             CASE "${Monat:text}"
               WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr - 1
               ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
               END
               AND followers is not null)
  GROUP BY profile, followers) as a,
  
(SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions,
profile
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
   AND 
             CASE "${Monat:text}"
               WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr - 1
               ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
               END
  GROUP BY profile
  ) as b
  WHERE a.profile = b.profile
  ORDER BY ARD_Facebook_Score DESC) as llm
  ON lm.Profil = llm.Profil
  ORDER BY lm.ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
)
SELECT followers.Profil,followers.followers, followers.FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut, followers.FollowerVeraenderung,anzahl_posts.Anzahlposts,
aktive_nutzer.AktiveNutzer, aktive_nutzer.AktiveNutzerVeraenderungAbsolut, aktive_nutzer.AktiveNutzerVeraenderung,
interaktionen.Interaktionen, interaktionen.InteraktionenVeraenderungAbsolut, interaktionen.InteraktionenVeraenderung,
potenzielle_reichweite.PotenzielleReichweite, potenzielle_reichweite.PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut, potenzielle_reichweite.PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung,
video_start.videoViews10s, video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut, video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderung, video_start.videoViews3s, video_start.videoViews3sVeraenderungAbsolut, video_start.videoViews3sVeraenderung,
ard_facebook_score.ARD_facebook_score, ard_facebook_score.ARDScore_VeraenderungAbsolut, ard_facebook_score.ARDScore_Veraenderung FROM followers 
LEFT JOIN anzahl_posts ON followers.Profil = anzahl_posts.Profil
LEFT JOIN aktive_nutzer ON followers.Profil = aktive_nutzer.Profil
LEFT JOIN interaktionen ON followers.Profil = interaktionen.Profil
LEFT JOIN potenzielle_reichweite ON followers.Profil = potenzielle_reichweite.Profil
LEFT JOIN video_start ON followers.Profil = video_start.Profil
LEFT JOIN ard_facebook_score ON followers.Profil = ard_facebook_score.Profil
ORDER BY Profil DESC

WITH followers as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_follower as followers,
    lm_follower - llm_follower as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
    (SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_follower, llm_follower) -1) * 100 as FollowerVeraenderung
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        page_follows lm_follower,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND time = (
          SELECT
            	
	
	
MAX(time)
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
          WHERE
            $Zeitraum
            AND page_follows is not null AND page_follows > 1000
        )
      ORDER BY
        page_follows desc
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        page_follows as llm_follower,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND time = (
          SELECT
            	
	
	
MAX(time)
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
          WHERE
            page_follows is not null
            and CASE
              ${Monat}
              WHEN 13 THEN EXTRACT(
                YEAR
                FROM
                  time
              ) = $Jahr -1
              ELSE (
                EXTRACT(
                  MONTH
                  from
                    time
                ) = EXTRACT(
                  MONTH
                  from
                    DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                )
                AND EXTRACT(
                  YEAR
                  from
                    time
                ) = EXTRACT(
                  YEAR
                  from
                    DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                )
              )
            END AND page_follows > 1000
        )
      ORDER BY
        page_follows desc
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.lm_follower DESC
),
anzahl_posts as (
  SELECT
    Profil,
    SUM(anzahlPosts) as anzahlPosts,
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        profile as Profil,
        COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsOwnPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND $Zeitraum
      GROUP BY
        profile
      UNION
      ALL
      SELECT
        profile as Profil,
        COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts,
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsightsExpiredPosts${table_suffix}` as facebook
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND $Zeitraum
      GROUP BY
        profile
    )
  GROUP BY
    Profil
), potenzielle_reichweite as (
SELECT
lm.Profil,
lm_potenzielle_reichweite as PotenzielleReichweite,
lm_potenzielle_reichweite - llm_potenzielle_reichweite as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_potenzielle_reichweite,llm_potenzielle_reichweite)-1)*100 as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
profile as Profil,
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_impressions_unique)/(COUNT(time))) as INT64) as lm_potenzielle_reichweite

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND page_follows is not null
AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY lm_potenzielle_reichweite desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
profile as Profil,
CAST(ROUND(SUM(page_impressions_unique)/COUNT(time)) as INT64) as llm_potenzielle_reichweite

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND page_follows is not null

AND 
             CASE "${Monat:text}"
               WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from facebook.time) = $Jahr - 1
               ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
               END 
GROUP BY profile
ORDER BY llm_potenzielle_reichweite desc
) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm_potenzielle_reichweite DESC
),
video_start as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_videoViews10s as videoViews10s,
    lm_videoViews10s - llm_videoViews10s as videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
    (
      SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_videoViews10s, llm_videoViews10s) -1
    ) * 100 as videoViews10sVeraenderung,
    lm_videoViews3s as videoViews3s,
    lm_videoViews3s - llm_videoViews3s as videoViews3sVeraenderungAbsolut,
    (SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_videoViews3s, llm_videoViews3s) -1) * 100 as videoViews3sVeraenderung,
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        CAST(
          ROUND(SUM(page_video_views_10s) / COUNT(time)) as INT64
        ) as lm_videoViews10s,
        CAST(
          ROUND(SUM(page_video_views) / COUNT(time)) as INT64
        ) as lm_videoViews3s,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND page_follows is not null
        AND $Zeitraum
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        lm_videoViews10s,
        lm_videoViews3s DESC
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        profile as Profil,
        CAST(
          ROUND(SUM(page_video_views_10s) / COUNT(time)) as INT64
        ) as llm_videoViews10s,
        CAST(
          ROUND(SUM(page_video_views) / COUNT(time)) as INT64
        ) as llm_videoViews3s
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND page_follows is not null
        AND CASE
          ${Monat}
          WHEN 13 THEN EXTRACT(
            YEAR
            FROM
              time
          ) = $Jahr -1
          ELSE (
            EXTRACT(
              MONTH
              from
                time
            ) = EXTRACT(
              MONTH
              from
                DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
            )
            AND EXTRACT(
              YEAR
              from
                time
            ) = EXTRACT(
              YEAR
              from
                DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
            )
          )
        END
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        llm_videoViews10s,
        llm_videoViews3s DESC
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.lm_videoViews10s,
    lm.lm_videoViews3s DESC
),
ard_facebook_score as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil as Profil,
    lm.ARD_Facebook_Score as ARD_facebook_score,
    lm.ARD_Facebook_Score - llm.ARD_Facebook_Score as ARDScore_VeraenderungAbsolut,
    (
      SAFE_DIVIDE(lm.ARD_Facebook_Score, llm.ARD_Facebook_Score) -1
    ) * 100 as ARDScore_Veraenderung
  FROM
(
      SELECT
        a.profile as Profil,
        ROUND(a.followers / 1000 + b.interactions / 10) as ARD_Facebook_Score
      FROM
        (
          SELECT
            profile,
            followers
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
            JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
              facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
              AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
            )
          WHERE
            True
            AND time = (
              SELECT
                	
	
	
MAX(time)
              FROM
                `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
              WHERE
                $Zeitraum
                AND followers is not null
            )
          GROUP BY
            profile,
            followers
        ) as a,
        (
          SELECT
            (
              ROUND (
                AVG(
                  ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments
                )
              )
            ) AS interactions,
            profile
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebook${table_suffix}` as facebook
            JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
              facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
              AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
            )
          WHERE
            True
            AND $Zeitraum
            AND followers is not null
          GROUP BY
            profile
        ) as b
      WHERE
        a.profile = b.profile
      ORDER BY
        ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        a.profile as Profil,
        ROUND(a.followers / 1000 + b.interactions / 10) as ARD_Facebook_Score
      FROM
        (
          SELECT
            profile,
            followers
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
            JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
              facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
              AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
            )
          WHERE
            True
            AND time = (
              SELECT
                	
	
	
MAX(time)
              FROM
                `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
              WHERE
                followers is not null
                and CASE
                  ${Monat}
                  WHEN 13 THEN EXTRACT(
                    YEAR
                    FROM
                      time
                  ) = $Jahr -1
                  ELSE (
                    EXTRACT(
                      MONTH
                      from
                        time
                    ) = EXTRACT(
                      MONTH
                      from
                        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                    )
                    AND EXTRACT(
                      YEAR
                      from
                        time
                    ) = EXTRACT(
                      YEAR
                      from
                        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                    )
                  )
                END
            )
          GROUP BY
            profile,
            followers
        ) as a,
        (
          SELECT
            (
              ROUND (
                AVG(
                  ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments
                )
              )
            ) AS interactions,
            profile
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.facebook${comp_table_suffix}` as facebook
            JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
              facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
              AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
            )
          WHERE
            True
            AND followers is not null
            AND CASE
              ${Monat}
              WHEN 13 THEN EXTRACT(
                YEAR
                FROM
                  time
              ) = $Jahr -1
              ELSE (
                EXTRACT(
                  MONTH
                  from
                    time
                ) = EXTRACT(
                  MONTH
                  from
                    DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                )
                AND EXTRACT(
                  YEAR
                  from
                    time
                ) = EXTRACT(
                  YEAR
                  from
                    DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
                )
              )
            END
          GROUP BY
            profile
        ) as b
      WHERE
        a.profile = b.profile
      ORDER BY
        ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
    ) as llm ON lm.Profil = llm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.ARD_Facebook_Score DESC
)
SELECT
  followers.Profil,
  followers.followers,
  followers.FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
  followers.FollowerVeraenderung,
  anzahl_posts.Anzahlposts,
  potenzielle_reichweite.PotenzielleReichweite,
  potenzielle_reichweite.PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut,
  potenzielle_reichweite.PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung,
  video_start.videoViews10s,
  video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
  video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderung,
  video_start.videoViews3s,
  video_start.videoViews3sVeraenderungAbsolut,
  video_start.videoViews3sVeraenderung,
  ard_facebook_score.ARD_facebook_score,
  ard_facebook_score.ARDScore_VeraenderungAbsolut,
  ard_facebook_score.ARDScore_Veraenderung
FROM
  followers
  LEFT JOIN anzahl_posts ON followers.Profil = anzahl_posts.Profil
  LEFT JOIN potenzielle_reichweite ON followers.Profil = potenzielle_reichweite.Profil
  LEFT JOIN video_start ON followers.Profil = video_start.Profil
  LEFT JOIN ard_facebook_score ON followers.Profil = ard_facebook_score.Profil
  ORDER BY Profil DESC

SELECT FORMAT_TIMESTAMP("%d.%m.%y",last_update) FROM

UNION ALL

 ORDER BY last_update LIMIT 1

WITH monthly_engaged_users AS (
  SELECT 
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'Ã¤','ae'),'Ã„','Ae'),'Ã¶','oe'),'Ã–','Oe'),'Ã¼','ue'),'Ãœ','Ue'),'.',''),'','') as profile, 
    SUM(page_engaged_users) AS engagedUsers,
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) AS month,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
    ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
  WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    AND last_update IN (
      SELECT MAX(last_update) 
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
      JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
        ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
      WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    )
    AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) >= DATE($Jahr - 2, $Monat, 1) 
    AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) <= LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH)
  GROUP BY profile, month
), top_profiles AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    profile,
    engagedUsers,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC) AS profile_rank
  FROM monthly_engaged_users
)
  SELECT 
    STRING_AGG(CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ')
  FROM top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank <= 8

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT

       CASE "${Monat:text}"
